Heading: Location
Value: Torrance, California.  Grew up in Perris (A rural Riverside Community).

Heading: Problems in school?
Value: Yes-Did poorly on written subjects but was Friendly and did well in music and shop classes.

Heading: Applied for job as a cop?
Abused drugs?
Value: Prostitutes had drugs in system upon death

Heading: Killer age at start of series
Race of victims
Value: All Caucasians except for one African American

Heading: Killing occurred in home of victim?
Killing occurred in home of killer?
Tortured victims?
Value: Stabbed face, chest, buttocks (chest mostly).  Shoved a light bulb up Leal’s vagina, strangled as mutilations took place. Most cause of death was listed as Asphyxiation.

Heading: Mutilated body?
Value: Genital and anus area, cut of right breast to shock police

Heading: Posed the body?
Value: Yes, some found posed in spread eagle position

Heading: Took totem – personal item
Value: Yes, would often take items of clothing and jewelry then give them to female friends.

Heading: Robbed victim or location
Value: Yes, took clothing and jewelry from victims

Heading: Left at scene, no attempt to hide
Value: Left along the road in a ravine

Heading: Left at scene, hidden
Value: Some hidden, off to the side of the road, under tree branches

Heading: Moved, no attempt to hide
Value: Sometimes, dumped in fields, groves, roadsides, and dumpsters

Heading: Cut-op and disposed of
Value: Yes, cut off right breast on occasion

Heading: Name and state of prison
Value: Death row at San Quentin Prison
